name: Life Place(Demo)|English
description:
“...Then there was a wonderful time when all the roads of life were open before us. When big cities waited with all their might for our footprints. It was the very time when we, the unintelligent, drove ourselves into fictitious frameworks, trying to please everyone at once, forgetting to listen to our hearts properly..."

We made this game and continue to make it, based on our feelings and experiences. All locations are real photos of our places of stay: where we were born and live one story after another, where we briefly stopped, listening to hackneyed, but favorite songs. All these places have settled in our hearts, so the story turns out to be atmospheric. This short story is only a prologue, we have set the main points in the story, then it remains to follow their relationship and the implementation of their plans for life.

Peculiarities

  • Dynamic backgrounds: Moving clouds and twinkling stars
  • Ability to change the look of backgrounds to pixel and classic

Types of backgrounds
